channel.title: How can I write something into character file, I tried this but didn't work [PI]

item.title: How can I write something into character file, I tried this but didn't work [PI]
item.dc:creator: @makersprivate123 makersprivate123
item.description:
@makersprivate123 wrote:

		if(playerCommand.startsWith("blabla")) {
		BufferedWriter load = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./Data/characters/"+c.playerName+".txt"));
		try{
		load.write("homeCoordsX = ", c.absX);
		load.write(Integer.toString(c.homeCoordsX), 0, Integer.toString(c.homeCoordsX));
		load.write("homeCoordsY = ", c.absY);
		load.write(Integer.toString(c.homeCoordsY), 0, Integer.toString(c.homeCoordsY));
			} catch (IOException e) {
			System.out.println("Couldn't set home for" + c.playerName);
			}
		}
